docs.text: Pytorch Basic DVC project template STEPS - STEP 01- Create a repository by using template repository STEP 02- Clone the new repository STEP 03- Create a conda environment after opening the repository in VSCODE conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env STEP 04- install the requirements pip install -r requirements.txt STEP 05- initialize the dvc project dvc init STEP 06- commit and push the changes to the remote repository
docs.title: Home

docs.text: conda create --prefix ./env python = 3 .7 -y conda activate ./env OR source activate ./env

docs.text: Section: 2 PyTorch Tensors and Operations What is tensor? A kind of data structure => multidimensional arrays or matrices With tensors you enocode all your parameters. Type Conversions Conversions from one datatype to another. Conversions from torch tensors to numpy arrays and vice versa.
